name: everyday dk socks
sizes_available: sizes 1 (2, 3, 4) correspond to an actual foot circumference of 7 (8, 9, 10) in/18 (20.5, 23, 25.5) cm measured around the ball of the foot.
notes:
the everyday dk socks pattern is my basic dk sock recipe. dk socks are quick to knit, thick, and super cozy! they are perfect for beginner sock-knitters, simple and mindless wips, gift-knitting, and showing off your favorite yarns!

yarn: dk

yardage: 185 yds - 350 yds/169 m - 320 m

needles: us 3/3.25 mm or size needed to obtain gauge

tools: tapestry needle, scrap yarn or stitch holder, 2 stitch markers

gauge: 26 sts & 36 rows = 4 in/10 cm in stockinette stitch after blocking

sizes: sizes 1 (2, 3, 4) correspond to an actual foot circumference of 7 (8, 9, 10) in/18 (20.5, 23, 25.5) cm measured around the ball of the foot.
